column4: Traffic;Tboung Khmum:------ A hit and run occurred at 11:50 am on July 16
column6: on National Road No. 7.------A white Range Rover
column8: driving at speed hit a student on a motorbike. The car then drove away from the scene and was found dumped around 1 kilometre away.------Pen Somath
column10: a female high school student at Hun Sen Pokheak High School. Chambok village
column13: Tbong Khmum province was seriously injured and later died.------After the incident
column14: the competent authorities examined the scene and opened an investigation.------https://postnews.com.kh/local/462886
